modal.findHomeDesc: Every year thousands of cute friends live on the streets. Finding them a safe home means not just a house, but a loving family. You can change the lives of these friends and give them a second chance. Every adoption saves a life and makes the world a better place.
modal.findFriendDesc: A great opportunity to meet pet owners, share your experiences and create beautiful memories together! Connect with people who share the same love, make new friendships and be part of the pet world. We are stronger together!
modal.foodWaterDesc: A small help makes a big difference for our hungry friends on the streets. A bowl of water, a piece of food can save their lives. Meeting the basic needs of these loving friends means giving them hope. Every help saves a life.

mission.headline: We don't leave our friends alone.
mission.description:
The "One Bowl of Food, One Bowl of Water" movement has started!
We believe we can make a big difference with a small touch for our street friends. As PetMedia, we encourage everyone to support our animal friends by placing a bowl of food and a bowl of water in front of their house.
A small bowl, a big kindness!
